= Javascript SAX 2 Parser =

== Introduction ==

That parser is able to read XML and its associated DTD, and throw the events of :
* contentHandler
* lexicalHandler
* errorHandler
* declarationHandler
* dtdHandler
* entityResolver
conforming to specification http://www.saxproject.org/ 


== How to use it ==

=== Import library ===

{{{
<script type="text/javascript" src="../jssaxparser/sax.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="../jssaxparser/DefaultHandlers.js"></script>
}}}

=== Use it ===

A simple example is :

{{{
var contentHandler = new DefaultHandler2();

var saxParser = XMLReaderFactory.createXMLReader();

saxParser.setHandler(contentHandler);
saxParser.parseString(xml);
}}}

Here, contentHandler is an instance of DefaultHandler2, receiving all events as defined at http://www.saxproject.org/apidoc/org/xml/sax/ext/DefaultHandler2.html

=== Do something ===

Now you might want to do something with that XML, then you have to implement the methods of contentHandler :

{{{
contentHandler.startElement = function(namespaceURI, localName, qName, atts) {
    document.getElementById("result").innerHTML += "<br/>startElement : [" + namespaceURI + "], [" + localName + "], [" + qName + "]";
};
}}}


=== The whole page ===

Is commited under jssaxparser/examples/simple.html :

{{{
<!DOCTYPE html PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD XHTML 1.0 Strict//EN" "http://www.w3.org/TR/xhtml1/DTD/xhtml1-strict.dtd">

<html xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xml:lang="en">
	<head>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="../jssaxparser/sax.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript" src="../jssaxparser/DefaultHandlers.js"></script>
		<script type="text/javascript">

function start() {

	var contentHandler = new DefaultHandler2();

	contentHandler.startElement = function(namespaceURI, localName, qName, atts) {
		document.getElementById("result").innerHTML += "<br/>startElement : [" + namespaceURI + "], [" + localName + "], [" + qName + "]";
	};

	var saxParser = XMLReaderFactory.createXMLReader();

	saxParser.setHandler(contentHandler);
	saxParser.parseString("<root><tag>value</tag></root>");
}
		</script>
	</head>

	<body onload="start()">
		<div id="result"></div>

	</body>
</html>
}}}
